subject: Drownings
Sprains and Strains
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Cornerback Josh Shaw, hailed as a hero by the Trojans’ athletic department, told officials Wednesday that he had lied about how he sprained his ankles over the weekend.
snippet: Cornerback Josh Shaw, hailed as a hero by the Trojans’ athletic department, told officials Wednesday that he had lied about how he sprained his ankles over the weekend.
